entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 23. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and local blowing snow beginning in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
